    Class
    Description
    class 
    RDFLinkAdapter
     
    class 
    RDFLinkDataset
    Implement of RDFLink over a Graph in the same JVM.
    class 
    RDFLinkFuseki
    Implementation of the RDFLink interface for connecting to an Apache Jena Fuseki.
    class 
    RDFLinkHTTP
    Implementation of the RDFLink interface using remote SPARQL operations.
    class 
    RDFLinkModular
    Implementation of RDFLink where the query, update and graph store operations are given by specific implementations of the respective interfaces.
